title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Product Name: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack

Description:

Get ready for some epic racing action with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This set includes five iconic vehicles, including Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. Each car is crafted in a 1:55 scale with Batcast Metal diecast material, ensuring durability and authenticity. The working wheels add to the realism, allowing your child to recreate thrilling scenes from the Batwheels series.

This pack is perfect for kids aged 3 years and older, encouraging imaginativeæ’­ and storytelling. The vehicles are compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset, available separately and subject to availability. With this 5-pack, your little ones can immerse themselves in the world of Batwheels, engaging in superhero versus super-villain racing action. Please note that the playset is not included and availability may vary. Let your child's imagination soar with these Batwheels diecast metal vehicles!
